result.purpose: Identifies by-value parameters that are larger than a specified number of bytes.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on a single responsibility of analyzing parameter sizes in Go code.

gotypes/hugeparam/main.go.purpose: Identifies by-value parameters that are larger than a specified number of bytes.
side_effects: Logs fatal errors if package loading fails.
Exits with status 1 if any packages contain errors.
